quest.name: No News Is Good News
journal: Godwin of the Wood Wailers has a report that requires urgent delivery.
Godwin has entrusted you with a classified report on recent happenings in the vicinity of Fallgourd Float. Deliver it to Vortefaurt of the Twin Adder with due haste.
Godwin's report relayed sightings of a masked man that have stirred alarm in Fallgourd Float. Might the menacing figure described be an Ascian?
objectives: Deliver the Fallgourd report to Vortefaurt.

dialogue.name: GODWIN
dialogue.text: Hail, adventurer. If you would not be averse to courier duty, I have a report that must be delivered to Florentel's Spire with all haste.

dialogue.name: GODWIN
dialogue.text: Mind you, this information is highly classified. I trust you to deliver it directly to the hands of Serpent Lieutenant Vortefaurt─without sneaking a peek for yourself.

dialogue.name: VORTEFAURT
dialogue.text: These parts abound with particularly ferocious beasts. You'd do well to keep a wide berth, adventurer, lest I be left to clean your carcass off the forest floor.

dialogue.name: VORTEFAURT
dialogue.text: A report from Godwin, you say? Very well, let us see... Traveling merchant waylaid by Qiqirn bandits, adventurer's hand bitten clean off by feral ziz, et cetera, et cetera... <sigh> The usual banalities.

dialogue.name: VORTEFAURT
dialogue.text: Hm? What's this? Sightings of a masked man...? “No casualties yet reported, but due vigilance should be exercised.”

dialogue.name: VORTEFAURT
dialogue.text: Troubling news, indeed─these parts are perilous enough without some masked marauder stirring up trouble. Thank you, friend. Rest assured that the Adder will be on the lookout for this interloper.
